name: attajak.vercel.app
description: This is a quick start template for Hugo theme [FixIt](https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt) & [FixIt-Bundle](https://github.com/hugo-fixit/fixit-bundle). It uses Hugo module feature to load the theme.

scripts.update:deps: hugo mod get -u github.com/hugo-fixit/fixit-bundle@latest && hugo mod tidy && git submodule update --remote --merge
scripts.list: npm run list:content && npm run list:mods

author: attajak (https://github.com/attajak)
